page.title: 15FARMING:ST.ALBANS
page.content: There are 3 farms near our school in Marshalswick.{Oak Farm}is an all arable farm and the crops grown are oil seed rape, barley and winter wheat.{Beech Farm}was a mixed dairy and arable farm but now it is entirely arable. Mr. Letts is the farm manager and has worked there for 2 yrs. He looks after the crops and does odd jobs around the farm. The farm is also part of St. Albans Sand and Gravel Co. {Nashes Farm}is owned by Mr. Sherriff. It is a mixed farm covering 214.5 hectares. Wheat, barley, oats and field beans are grown. Since the Jersey Farm Estate has been built lots of sparrows come to eat the crops. Cattle are also kept. Each cow has a calf and adopts a second one to look after. Mr. Sherriff enters his bulls into a lot of competitions and they often win.
